remarks: Expand out the substitutions in ~ df-gsum .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Sep-2015.)
statement:
gsumval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumval.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumval.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
gsumval.o $e |- O = { s e. B | A. t e. B ( ( s .+ t ) = t /\ ( t .+ s ) = t ) } $.
gsumval.w $e |- ( ph -> W = ( `' F " ( _V \ O ) ) ) $.
gsumval.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. V ) $.
gsumvalx.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. X ) $.
gsumvalx.a $e |- ( ph -> dom F = A ) $.
gsumvalx $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) = if ( ran F C_ O , .0. , if ( A e. ran ... , ( iota x E. m E. n e. ( ZZ>= ` m ) ( A = ( m ... n ) /\ x = ( seq m ( .+ , F ) ` n ) ) ) , ( iota x E. f ( f : ( 1 ... ( # ` W ) ) -1-1-onto-> W /\ x = ( seq 1 ( .+ , ( F o. f ) ) ` ( # ` W ) ) ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d .+ s t x $.
$d B s t x $.
$d F f m n x $.
$d G f m n x $.
$d O f m n x $.
$d f m n ph x $.
